Package com.example.carturestibackend.services

Class CategoryService

java.lang.Object
com.example.carturestibackend.services.CategoryService
@Service public class CategoryService extends Object
Service class to handle business logic related to categories.

  • Method Details

    • findCategories

      public List<CategoryDTO> findCategories()
      Retrieves all categories from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of CategoryDTO objects representing the categories.

    • findCategoryById

      public CategoryDTO findCategoryById(long id_category)
      Retrieves a category by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id_category - The ID of the category to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The CategoryDTO object representing the retrieved category.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.ResourceNotFoundException - if the category with the specified ID is not found.

    • insert

      public long insert(CategoryDTO categoryDTO)
      Inserts a new category into the database.
      Parameters:
      categoryDTO - The CategoryDTO object representing the category to insert.
      Returns:
      The ID of the newly inserted category.

    • deleteCategoryById

      public void deleteCategoryById(long id_category)
      Deletes a category from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id_category - The ID of the category to delete.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.ResourceNotFoundException - if the category with the specified ID is not found.

    • updateCategory

      public CategoryDTO updateCategory(long id_category, CategoryDTO categoryDTO)
      Updates an existing category in the database.
      Parameters:
      id_category - The ID of the category to update.
      categoryDTO - The updated CategoryDTO object representing the new state of the category.
      Returns:
      The updated CategoryDTO object.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.data.rest.webmvc.ResourceNotFoundException - if the category with the specified ID is not found.
